person.persName: Robert B. Steger (Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (13th KY Inf))

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Virginia native. Son of Machinias Steger and Lucy Steger. Married to Hannah A. Steger. Father of Mary Steger. Attended school in Adair County in 1850. Family owned three enslaved persons in Adair County in 1850. Farmer in Taylor County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private and sergeant from December 31, 1861 to January 12, 1865.
